title: Half-Blood Mage
description: She’s a girl from the suburbs. He’s a dragon hunter from Solair. Together, they'll race to save their worlds.Lia is a typical high school senior… except that she sees visions of the future and her nights are plagued with nightmares about dragons. Lia fears she’s going crazy. Until nightmares become reality and she’s pulled into the world of Solair.Kieren is admired as one of the fiercest Solairian dragon hunters… until the day he’s cursed to become one of the beasts he hunts. Long dormant, Solair’s magic is reawakening and an ancient evil wants to use Lia and Kieren’s untapped powers to rule the world.If Lia and Kieren can’t master the magic in their blood and the feelings stirring in their hearts, Solair and Earth may be destroyed forever.Fans of magic, powerful heroines, diverse characters, and romance will love this epic story. Binge the entire series today!Complete Light and Fire Series:• Half-Blood Mage• The Lady Thief• Haven of Smoke and Shadows• A Heart So Dark
author: Ginger Li
